name: David Hasselhoff Lyrics Quiz II: David's Revenge | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Fill in the lyric: "I've been looking for _______"
questions.explanation:
freedom.

	"Looking for Freedom" is David's all-time number 1 hit.

questions.text: Name the song: "Don't want to lose her in the Champs Elysee."
questions.correct: Je T'Aime Means I Love You
options: The Best is Yet to Come
questions.explanation:
Je T'Aime Means I Love You.

	"Je T'Aime Means I Love You" is an interesting combination of French and English.  It is from the same album as "Looking for Freedom"- that album is "Looking for Freedom."

questions.text: Fill in the lyric: "Limbo cool, limbo fine. Clap your hands, it's _____ time."
questions.explanation:
party.

	"Do the Limbo Dance" is the only hit song from the 1991 album, "David."

questions.text: Name the song: "We've got the power, we've got the Lord."
questions.explanation:
Everybody Sunshine.

	"Everybody Sunshine" is the only hit song from the 1992 album of the same name.

questions.text: Fill in the lyric: "We'll build a ______ out of honesty."
questions.explanation:
castle.

	You'll have gotten this if you took the first David Hasselhoff Lyrics Quiz. It's from the song "Flying on the Wings of Tenderness."

questions.text: Time for an easy one.  Name the song: "Das goldnes gras."
questions.explanation:
Wir Zwei Allein.

	"Wir Zwei Allein" is a duet with the wonderful Gwen.

questions.text: Fill in the lyric: "Our love is like red hot _____."
questions.explanation:
Steel.

	"Hot Shot City" is particularly good. Red hot steel is pretty freaking hot!

questions.text: Name the song: "If you stay true to your heart, you're equal to all."
options: Flying on the Wings of Tenderness
questions.explanation:
I Believe.

	"I Believe" is David's hit single from "Baywatch", a duet with the beautiful and talented Laura Branigan.  I think we can all learn a lot from this song.

questions.text: Fill in the lyric: "'Cause when the dance is all over, we do a sweet ____________."
questions.explanation:
bossanova.

	"Dance Dance D'Amour" is a great song about dancing to French words.  It's from the wonderful 1993 album "You Are Everything."

questions.text: Name the song: "Allein kannst mich versteh'n."
questions.explanation:
Du.

	Despite its funny name, "Du" is quite a stirring song from the cleverly titled 1994 album, "Du."
